Title: Prophet Khar'zul
Description:
Prophet Khar'zul is a powerful caster, but he is also underestimating your abilities.

Khar'zul and his forces must be destroyed to protect this village. His death will send a strong message to the Thunder King that we will not be defeated!

You'll find him on the Isle of Reckoning.
RewardText:
These events should be learned from, $n.

It is important that we learn from our history. Had we paid attention to the histories, we may have been able to head this off before it got this far.

Everything that has happened was already foretold, we just didn't know how to read it.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Mishi in Zouchin Village
